description: This table is used to extract information on component-level repeats.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the result record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RPT_COMP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the repeat component.

columns.name: RPT_COMP_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the component.

columns.name: RPT_SELECT_YN_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates whether a repeat component was selected.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: RPT_COMP_VALUE
columns.description: Repeat component value

columns.name: RPT_ORIG_VALUE
columns.description: Repeat component original value

columns.name: RPT_COMP_UNITS
columns.description: Repeat component units

columns.name: RPT_ABNORMAL_C_NAME
columns.description:
Repeat component abnormal value


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Normal

columns.name: RPT_DELTA_YN_NAME
columns.description:
Repeat component delta


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: RPT_SELECT_YN_NAME

columns.name: RPT_NORM_LOW
columns.description: Repeat component normal low value

columns.name: RPT_NORM_HIGH
columns.description: Repeat component normal high value

columns.name: RPT_COMMENT
columns.description: Repeat component comment

columns.name: RPT_METHOD_ID
columns.description: Repeat component method

columns.name: RPT_METHOD_ID_METHOD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the instrument interface, method, method grouper, or middle tier interface record.

columns.name: RPT_NORM_RANGE
columns.description: The normal range for the repeat component or a list of values that are considered normal.

columns.name: RPT_VAL_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The repeat component validation status category number for the repeat component.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Not Verified and Held


Verified and Passed


Verified and Failed


Verified, Failed & Held


Not Evaluated

columns.name: RPT_RES_INSTANT
columns.description: Repeat component resulting instant

columns.name: RPT_RES_LAB_ID
columns.description: Repeat component resulting lab ID

columns.name: RPT_VER_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Repeat component verification status


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


In Progress


Resulted


Preliminary


Verified


Cancel


Don't Test


Deleted


Pending Preliminary Verification


Pending Final Verification


Corrected


Cosign

columns.name: RPT_VER_INSTANT
columns.description: Repeat component verification instant

columns.name: RPT_VER_LAB_ID
columns.description: Repeat component verification lab ID

columns.name: RPT_VER_USER_ID
columns.description: Repeat component verification user

columns.name: IS_RPT_REPORTD_YN_NAME
columns.description:
Flags whether or not repeat component is reported


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: RPT_SELECT_YN_NAME

columns.name: RPT_INTERPRET_C_NAME
columns.description:
Repeat component interpretation


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: RPT_AB_UNITS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Repeat component antibiotic units


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: RPT_AB_COMMENTS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The antibiotic comment category number for the repeat antibiotic component.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: RPT_RFLX_ACTIONS
columns.description: Repeat component reflex actions fired

columns.name: RPT_CAL_COM_RFLX_R
columns.description: Repeat calculated component reflex reasons

columns.name: RPT_COMP_RESULT
columns.description: Repeat component result

columns.name: REPEAT_COMP_DILUTE
columns.description: The factor by which the value is diluted for each component repeat.

columns.name: REPEAT_LINEARITY_YN
columns.description:
The linearity flag for this component repeat.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: RPT_SELECT_YN_NAME

columns.name: REPEAT_RPT_SET_BY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates how the report flag for this component was determined


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Test Settings


User


Preference Rules


Cascading Rules


Organism Result Checking


Suppressed by User


Suppressed by Auto Verification


Interface

columns.name: REP_CMP_REV_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description:
Records the type of cytology review performed for a given result.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Initial cytotech review


Cytotech rescreen


Pathologist review

columns.name: RPT_EDITING_USER_ID
columns.description: The user that resulted the related repeat component.

columns.name: REPEAT_INTERP_SET_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates how the interpretation for this component was determined.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


User


Interface


Result Checking


Preference Rules


Cascading Rules

columns.name: USR_OVRD_ABNL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the user record. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table. Records the user responsible for overriding abnormality or reference range for this component repeat.

columns.name: USR_OVRD_RPT_FLG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the user record. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table. Records the user responsible for overriding the reportable flag for this component repeat.

columns.name: REPEAT_RES_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant when the repeat was resulted in UTC.

columns.name: RPT_VERIF_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant in UTC at which the component repeat on the corresponding line was verified.

columns.name: REPEAT_REPORTABLE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reportable category ID for the component repeat.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Not Reportable


Reportable

columns.name: RPT_LNC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the LOINC record as reported by the external resulting agency for a specific repeat of the component associated with this result.

columns.name: RPT_SUSC_MTD_LNC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the LOINC record associated with the susceptibility method for the specific repeat of the component on this result as reported by the external resulting agency.

columns.name: REPEAT_COMP_ACCR_YN
columns.description:
This item determines the accreditation status of the corresponding component repeat. If set to Y-Yes, the corresponding component repeat is accredited. If set to N-No, the corresponding component repeated is not accredited. If null, no evaluation was performed on the component repeat to determine if it is accredited or not.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: RPT_SELECT_YN_NAME
